title: Approximations from table of f' part - d

content.question: Write the second-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x = 1. Use the Taylor polynomial to approximate f(1.4).

frqParts.text: Write the second-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x = 1. Use the Taylor polynomial to approximate f(1.4).

topic.text: 10.11: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor Polynomial Approximations of Functions
